hypothesis_content.title: 15-Minute Volume Spike Reversal After News
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a scheduled macroeconomic news event (US CPI, FOMC, NFP), if BTC's 15-minute volume is > 300% of its 20-period moving average and the price moves > 1.5% in the event candle, a fade of that initial move entered at the next candle's open will be profitable within 90 minutes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High-impact news causes knee-jerk reactions from algos and retail, often overextending price relative to the news' actual implications. Professional traders and market makers fade these extreme moves to capture the reversion as liquidity normalizes.
entry_conditions: Scheduled high-impact news event occurs (pre-defined list)
15-minute candle encompassing event has volume > 300% of its 20-period MA
Enter at open of following candle in opposite direction of event candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: 50% retracement of the event candle's range
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Event candle's high/low (for long/short) exceeded by 0.3%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If the fade trade loses more often than it wins, or if the average win is less than 0.8 times the average loss over 30+ event samples.
